item.title: Nova Agritech Declines 9.51%: 2 Key Events Mark a Challenging Week
item.description: Nova Agritech Ltd’s shares declined sharply by 9.51% over the week ending 27 Feb 2026, closing at Rs.29.59 compared to Rs.32.70 the previous Friday. This underperformance was stark against the Sensex’s modest 0.96% fall, reflecting ongoing financial pressures and a persistent downtrend culminating in fresh 52-week and all-time lows.
